title: HVAC Chiller Replacement - Building A
description: 500-ton centrifugal chiller reached end of life at 18 years. Complete replacement with high-efficiency variable speed unit. Includes refrigerant reclaim and crane rental for rooftop access.

title: Elevator Modernization - Cars 1 and 2
description: Modernize 2 of 4 passenger elevators with new controllers door operators and cab finishes. Original 2002 equipment exceeding maintenance costs. Phase 1 of 4-car program.

title: Parking Garage Structural Repair - Level 5
description: Concrete spalling and exposed rebar on level 5 deck due to salt intrusion. Remove delaminated concrete apply corrosion inhibitor patch with polymer-modified concrete and seal.

title: Roof Membrane Replacement - North Wing
description: 20-year-old built-up roof membrane failing with multiple active leaks. Full tear-off and replacement with 60-mil TPO membrane including new insulation and edge flashing.

title: Fire Alarm Panel Upgrade
description: Original 2007 fire alarm panel no longer supported by manufacturer. Replace with new addressable panel and update all initiating and notification devices to current code.

title: Boiler Replacement - Building 1
description: One of two 2-million BTU condensing boilers failed. Replace with new high-efficiency unit. Includes piping modifications and controls integration.

title: Tenant Build-Out - Suite 1400
description: New tenant build-out for DataVault Cloud Services. 12000 SF including raised floor data room supplemental cooling and UPS power.

title: Exterior Paint - All Buildings
description: Full exterior repaint of all 80 townhome units. Power wash prep prime and two-coat finish. Includes trim caulking and wood repair.

title: Pool Pump and Filter Replacement
description: Main pool circulation pump failed. Replace pump motor and sand filter media. Includes pool heater inspection and chemical controller calibration.

title: Garage Door Replacement - 4 Units
description: 4 of 8 dock-height overhead doors showing excessive wear. Replace with new insulated sectional doors with high-speed openers and safety sensors.

title: Landscape Irrigation System Overhaul
description: Complete irrigation system overhaul including new smart controllers drip conversion for planting beds and backflow preventer replacement.

title: Emergency Generator Load Bank Test
description: Annual load bank testing of 500kW emergency generator serving Sysco cold storage facility. Test at 25% 50% 75% and 100% rated load. Transfer switch operation verification.

title: Water Intrusion Investigation - Unit 2204
description: Resident reports water staining on ceiling during heavy rain. Investigate exterior wall curtain wall and balcony flashing for source. Repair as needed.

title: Pipe Burst Repair - Building 3
description: 2-inch domestic water line burst in warehouse Building 3 during freeze event. Emergency repair including valve replacement and insulation of exposed piping.

title: Parking Lot Seal Coat and Restripe
description: Main parking lot seal coat and full restriping including handicap spaces fire lane markings and directional arrows. Night work required to avoid tenant impact.

title: HVAC Controls Upgrade - Floors 6-10
description: Upgrade pneumatic HVAC controls to DDC BACnet system on floors 6-10. Includes new VAV box controllers sensors and integration with existing BAS.

title: Vacancy Renovation - Units 101-108
description: 8 units vacated in January. Full turnover renovation including new flooring paint kitchen counters appliance refresh and bathroom hardware.

title: Mall Anchor Space Remediation
description: Former Dillard's space vacant since 2024. Remediate space for new tenant including mold remediation from HVAC shutdown demo of fixture walls and MEP modifications.

title: Greenspoint Property Stabilization
description: Minimum stabilization of distressed property. Board up broken windows. Secure all entries. Remove vandalism graffiti. Maintain minimum utilities to prevent pipe freeze.
